en.title: New desktop version available
en.description: Upgrade now to access custom desktop notification sounds, Russian spell check, and an improved user experience using multiple workspaces.

en.title: New server version available
en.description: Mattermost server v5.29 is now available offering many bug fixes for increased stability as well as the general availability of a pre-installed incident management application (E20), channel moderation settings (E20), and Mattermost Omnibus. [Upgrading](https://docs.mattermost.com/administration/upgrade.html) only takes a few minutes.
